website_summaries.verdict: A simple and affordable plastic soap dish that blends into the background. Perfect if you're looking for a quick and easy pick.
pros: Unobtrusive design works in any bathroom
Plastic is sturdy and won't easily crack
Raised ridges help keep soap dry
Compact dimensions don't take up much space
cons: The ridges aren't very high and soap may get soggy if water is allowed to accumulate

customer_reviews.title: Work well with Tank Top Tray for my shampoo bars
customer_reviews.text: Four of these fit perfectly in the Tank Top Tray ( I started using shampoo bars (and soap bars), and needed some way to keep them dry so they wouldn't melt everywhere. And, I like having several varieties of shampoo bars available to me so that I can choose different ones based upon what my hair needs or based upon the smell I want that morning. I didn't want a full bathtub tray that went across my tub, as that would just get in my way when I bathes. Instead, these (with the tray) keep everything nicely clean and contained on the shelf / side of my bathtub.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Nice clear, hard plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and love that it is the hard plastic, not the soft flexible type. You could mistake it for glass as another reviewer said ( as long as you don't pick it up... Glass is heavier). It will blend with your vanity and keep it dry. A regular bar soap will fit on it, so you don't have to be extra careful not to make a mess. I like liquid soap for the hands, but it is nice to have a bar of soap for washing your face quickly and not having all the cleanup afterwards. Pamper yourself and get this little jewel.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet elegant!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the downstairs powder room and my upstairs bathroom. They are very simple yet elegant, and they fit in very well with the decor of the bathroom. My intention was for them to be understated and functional and that is exactly what they are. Our remodel was extensive and expensive and these complement perfectly ;-)!
customer_reviews.author: wdgolf

customer_reviews.title: nice, inexpensive soap dish
customer_reviews.text: I love homemade glycerine soap, but unless it is in a raised dish, it dissolves in standing water. I have a nice clear acrylic one I bought for myself years ago that works great. Was looking for one for my son's new house and couldn't find one that was really inexpensive but would do the job well. Then I saw this one. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, but not the best at saving your soap bar
customer_reviews.text: This soap dish fits the shower shelf, which is why we own it. But it doesn't do a great job of preserving the soap (although it does keep soap residue off the tile). I may replace it with a teak soap dish that will allow for better water drainage. It is inexpensive, and looks that way.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as is pictured and solved the problem of my soap bar constantly slipping off of the built-in shelf. As others have mentioned this doesn't drain, but I like that as the soapy residue then won't leave a sudsy waterfall down the wall of my shower. I just empty it out manually at the end of every other shower (I say every other because I imagine when my husband showers he's not as diligent as I am). It's durable as I dropped it while scrubbing the shower and there is no sign of trauma. Phew. Also, it has not built up any soap scum or mildew. The clear color is nice because it matches all showers!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I need. I used to have a metal soap dish, but it starting rusting so I wanted to get one that wouldn't do that. This one met the bare requirements plus some. It also has groves so the soap can sit above any water that gets into the dish. Its great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soap holder
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Simple, Low cost and effective I dropped it a few times and it didn't break. I can even scrub and wash it off when it gets coated in soap. Note: No holes in the bottom so you do have to drain water that gets in there every now and then. You can always drill your own holes if this is a big issue for you.
customer_reviews.author: GreenCowLand

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality basic soap holder. I love the ridges so it prevents the soap from getting too soggy at the bottom. Also very easy to clean and don't have to worry about a lot of build up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Generic soap dish
customer_reviews.text: This soap dish is just a regular old soap dish. The plastic is high quality. It keeps my soap bar from getting soggy. Seems a bit expensive for a plain plastic soap dish, but I guess that's what soap dishes are going for these days...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soap dish is a soap dish...
customer_reviews.text: yep, it's a soap dish....price is right for quality of product, which seems about as good as you can expect....just wish the ridges were just a little taller, to keep soap bar even further away from water.....but otherwise fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dancel

customer_reviews.title: Glam it up ,matchable with any thing
customer_reviews.text: I spray painted mine. Sprayed matalic gold on the outside of dish, it is perfect with my new sink and other Glam containers. I made it what I wanted and cost of other dish are do expensive. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lori E.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but nothing special. Does not add any class to my bathroom. It’s just a soap dish
customer_reviews.author: Southern Yankee

customer_reviews.title: Read the whole description
customer_reviews.text: I thought/assumed this was a flexible plastic. Nope. Not worth returning and kept it but don't really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdgirl

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The perfect soap dish! It is what you'd expect and want. The quality is excellent, and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect buying experience, arrived on time and as described. Great transaction!
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a soap holder that was plastic, sturdy, and would fit on a small shelf in my shower. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley M

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about a clear plastic soap dish. It's life changing! Yeah, right. It's ridiculous how long one must look in several big box stores to find a decent simple soap dish. Even if I could have found one for $0.99 somewhere, the time I spent would have offset the savings. Actually, it's time I wasted anyway because I didn't find anything!
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but gets dirty fast!
customer_reviews.text: I reccomend throwing this in the dishwasher when you run a load. As nice as this looks it gets mucky with the post washing dish sponge liquid. That liquid then builds up on here and its not pretty. Otherwise it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had some slits in the bottom for ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had some slits in the bottom for the water to drain out of the dish. The soap was always sitting in water.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Nice soap holder, but it is a bit overpriced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Edythe Sonder

customer_reviews.title: So kind of by default I bought this one and i love it. It doesn't really get soap scummy either
customer_reviews.text: I mean what can I say? It's a dish that you put soap in. For some reason I had a really hard time finding a cheap plastic soap dish? So kind of by default I bought this one and i love it. It doesn't really get soap scummy either. Great quality for the press I've already dropped it once lol
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Holds a large bar of soap.
customer_reviews.text: Dropped a couple of times with no breakage or chips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great soap holder
customer_reviews.text: Favorite soap holder. I got this Feb 16 2016. And just threw it away. I felt like I did use it for longer than I should have. But am going to purchase another one today. I like it because it's real sturdy and easy to clean. I only have to replace my old one because I didn't clean it for awhile. I just decided to get a new one. I usually use a cutip to clean the inside corners. While I'm running it over hot water and soap.
customer_reviews.author: Maria and Yami

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Too short. Not very useful. Can only put very small bottles o spices.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer sheryl k

customer_reviews.title: Seems kind of like a no brainer when designing a soap dish
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done but I wish there was a tiny drainage hole or two in the dish so that water doesn't accummulate and stand which slowly turns the bar of soap into mush. Seems kind of like a no brainer when designing a soap dish, yet for some reason not at all standard.
customer_reviews.author: A. Daily

customer_reviews.title: This product is very nice. It doesn't leave the soap and soggy gross ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice. It doesn't leave the soap and soggy gross mess like other soap dishes. Be mindful to rinse properly every once and awhile.
customer_reviews.author: lemondrop

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Quality dish, does the job. My soap doesn’t sit in water all day.
customer_reviews.author: T. Price

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It cracked and wasn’t very durable very disappointed and have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Clean look. hold soap. Doesnt move around the shower when wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: "Clearly" does the job!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job and does not upstage custom tile work in shower niche. Ordered a couple more for other shower areas! Very pleased with this simple, inexpensive soap dish that is easy to rinse out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H.

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but good
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a bit pricey for plastic but looks good and gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: harmony fowler

customer_reviews.title: Nice soap dish
customer_reviews.text: I had my tub and tile resurfaced and cannot leave wet soap in the soap holder in there. I purchased this to remind me to take the soap out of the tub after I shower. It is clear and doesn't distract from the new wallpaper. The soap dries in it without leaving a gooey mess.
customer_reviews.author: H. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had a surprisingly difficult time finding a cheap soap dish for our gym bathroom. Not going to wax poetic about a soap dish, but the quality seems nice, it is a good size for your standard bar soap, and it was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: GGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Might work better in a dry climate
customer_reviews.text: Indents need to be taller, water that drips off the soap just lingers so the soap remains mushy for extended time. Might work better in a dry climate.
customer_reviews.author: AriVari

customer_reviews.title: Dimension Incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-molded clear soap dish with raised ridges, but it can only accommodate one bar of soap. The dimensions, which say it is 6.9 inches long, are incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: AFR

customer_reviews.title: Works as described.
customer_reviews.text: Great soap dish, and the clear plastic looks nice in the bathrooms

customer_reviews.title: Bought two for travel and home for my contacts
customer_reviews.text: I use one at home to put my contacts for drying and one to use for traveling. Well made and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Don't overthink it
customer_reviews.text: It's a clear soap dish. Don't over think it. If you need it, buy it.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do. Wish it were a bit heavier.

customer_reviews.title: They're perfect for holding soap and staying in place so that ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased a couple more of these. They're perfect for holding soap and staying in place so that I don't have soapy runoff stretching along my sinks. It's not particularly stylish, but it's sturdy and simple... perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Really LOVED these soap holders
customer_reviews.text: Really LOVED these soap holders. I would highly recommend these as well as the oval shaped ones (that I think I like even better).

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't drain water
customer_reviews.text: The soap dish collects water. The ridges aren't tall enough to keep the soap bar out of water. Found a clear plastic soap dish at Wal-Mart with holes to drain water for 97 cents....

customer_reviews.title: Inespensive, holds soap
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid, looks good and holds the soap. Matches the clear basket I also bought on Amazon. Super easy to rinse off also.

customer_reviews.title: NO MILDEW BUILD UP
customer_reviews.text: Really great soap dish! I've have had it for months. No mildew at all! Highly recommended!!

customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly sized soap dish for bath or kitchen. The weight is good but not heavy. If you want a heavier soap dish, go with marble. This one is plastic and easily washed.

customer_reviews.text: Simple design, works great. Dropped it from a good height (top of my shower door) and it survived the fall.

customer_reviews.text: It is what it is, and for the price, perfect. Plastic is hard and substantial, not flimsy. Well done

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our soap dish. Not flemsy. I could not find a thin square one in the store. Amazon to the rescue!

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's small. It's clear. It's easily cleaned. If one wants something that will fit in most any space, whether in a cubby or on the ledge of the tub or shower, this soap dish is for you. Because it is clear, the eye moves right over it, leaving room for your "real" decor. The best part of the dish is that it is easy to wash. It's not fancy nor expensive but it serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great simple, durable soap dish at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. I just wanted a simple, durable soap dish for the shower. It arrived on time. No problems.

customer_reviews.title: It's a soap dish. It holds my soap. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a soap dish. It holds my soap. My soap doesn't go anywhere. The product does what it was meant to do: hold my soap.

customer_reviews.title: Soap Dish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the shower niches, keeps soap scum from collecting on tile.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K. Corriea

customer_reviews.title: Soap dish
customer_reviews.text: I mean it's a soap dish. What could go wrong ?
customer_reviews.author: Southern Wife

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE if you care about your soap
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a day and it DESTROYED my very expensive bar of soap. I added a picture to show the soap destruction, this was after only 24 hours of use. I don't know if the dish isn't deep enough or if it's just bad design, but the soap used to be one solid yellow color and now a ton of it is white, mushy and gross. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: AmyLynne

customer_reviews.title: Great basic soap dish to be placed next to a sink.
customer_reviews.text: This soap dish by InterDesign is a very low key design to be best used next to a sink, not inside the shower room. It is made with very clear plastic with dimensions of about 5 inches in length by 3 and a half inches in width...the depth is about half inch (pretty shallow). Since water gets caught inside as there is no drain, I prefer to use this dish next to a sink. The rounded edges are easy on the eyes and it is light and durable, so it is safer for use by kids, too (as opposed to glass of ceramic dishes). Given the price and quality, I readily recommend this soap dish.
customer_reviews.author: Max™

customer_reviews.title: Easier to clean than scraping the shower shelf
customer_reviews.text: Got this because wife complained about the soap scum on the shower shelf. She makes her own specialty bar soap to use and hated how it left a layer of soap scum that she had to scrape off when cleaning the shower. Said this has been a lot easier to use because it can easily be soaked or run through the dishwasher if it gets soap built up on it. Size was just right and seem durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: Birddawg

customer_reviews.title: It's fine, but could be a tad bit bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it works for what I need it for. It fits nicely in my shower, and I'll probably find another to put near my bathroom sink. I do think it's a bit expensive for something I could probably buy cheaper at Walmart. It's also a tad bit smaller than I expected. Overall, it's fine and if you don't want to take the drive out to Walmart, then yeah buy it here. If you would like to save a few bucks then just take the drive to Walmart. Luckily for the seller, I'm too lazy to drive to another store half the time. I do like it though, I just wish it was a tad bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: looks Nice new. But not when in use
customer_reviews.text: The soap and water leftover make this item dirty easily and it looks really dirty most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio M.

customer_reviews.title: Works good to use by the kitchen sink
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use by the kitchen sink, as a place to park the scrubee pad. Works good enough. Like the way it looks, blends well with any style. Lower rating is due to: on receiving it, soap dish had a scratch halfway down one side. Looks like it might have been scratched by a utility blade as a box of these were opened. I checked to see that this scratch was not so deep as to cause it to break. It seemed ok, but better if it had not been scratched at all.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Bee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but goes the trick.
customer_reviews.text: We love this little soap dish because it fits the soap we get perfectly. It didn’t cost much, so I wasn’t expecting anything fantastic. It’s thin and cheap but does what it’s meant to do. Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Mariano

customer_reviews.title: Good size but no holes so useless to me
customer_reviews.text: Not good for shower or around tub. Has no opening to let the water so soap pretty much sits on water and melts away! I had to improvise and use a really hot knife to make holes on the bottom and it looks awful but at least my soap is not sitting in a puddle of water and getting all discussing and melting
customer_reviews.author: Belkis Hoyos

customer_reviews.title: It works for my purposes but not worth money
customer_reviews.text: I think this was overpriced since it is cheap plastic. I've only just started using it so I am not sure how it will hold up, but it appears to lack durability. There is no drainage in the design but I do not mind. I like that the bottom of the dish is level so it sits level in my shower caddy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: iDesign Royal Plastic Rectangular Soap Saver, Bar Holder Tray for Bathroom Counter, Shower, Kitchen, 3.5" x 5.25", Clear
product_meta.description: The iDesign Royal Soap Savers are your solution to keeping soap bars clean and dry. This rectangular bar soap holder is great for keeping soap or sponges within arm's reach at any sink. The trays are made of durable clear plastic for years of quality use. The textured base holds your soap or sponge to prevent any slipping off the base or around the counter. These soap holders are great to use in the bathroom, shower, kitchen, or laundry room. Each soap saver measures 3.5" x 5.25", perfect for your counter space. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
feature_bullets: BAR SOAP HOLDER: Soap saver holds bar soap, sponges, scrubbies, dish brushes, razors, small accessories, and more. Great for use in bathroom, kitchen, shower, laundry room, or mudroom
DURABLE: Made of clear, durable plastic for years of quality use
FUNCTIONAL: Textured surface securely holds soap and sponges and prevents them from sliding off of the tray
RECTANGLE SHAPE: Rectangular design matches shape of bar soap to securely hold any standard bar
IDEAL SIZE: Soap saver measures 3.5" x 5.25", perfect for your counter

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
